text: we have spent almost two years traveling

we've come to love our van and it's

incredible adventures but if there's one
thing we've learned over the last two
years it's that any home on wheels comes
with its own set of unique challenges
the pipes froze and burst oh tragic yeah
it's really in there yeah those
challenges encountering challenges like
these has made us wonder could life be

wheels so from time to time we move out
of our van and into a different vehicle
to see what life might have been like
had we made a different choice today
we're trying out the winnebago echo
which retails for over 170 thousand
